result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lynn E Chapman

defendant.name: Chapman, Lynn E

records.addlTxt:
9:58 AM Defendant Lynn E Chapman not in court.  Attorney Blake Gross appeared by video for Lynn E Chapman.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Gross states defendant is in custody in the Gogebic County Jail.  Attorney Gross requests PLEAS date.  He will notify the Court of defendant's custody status for purposes of a transport order.  Bond continued.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Does not go on Trig's premises grocery stores

2:30 PM Defendant Lynn E Chapman appeared by video, in custody from the Gogebic County Jail.  Attorney Blake Gross appeared specially by video for Lynn E Chapman.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Court quashes warrant. Court imposes $500.00 CASH bond with conditions: Does not go on Trig's premises grocery stores.  Victim rights complied with. No victim appearing. He may be filing motions to withdraw if the contact with client does not improve. Defense asks for initial appearance with status on other cases at the same time. Bond continued.
Initial appearance scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Status hearing on October 3, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
9:47 AM Defendant Lynn E Chapman not in court.  ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court authorizes bench warrant due to non appearance - $1,000 CASH.

from defendant requesting bond modification . written May 4th, received in COC 5-17.  Cash bond since posted.

10:30 AM Defendant Lynn E Chapman appeared by video. ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim rights legislation has been complied with. Public defender has not appointed counsel as of this date.  Court continues bond.  Defendant may appear by zoom for next hearing.
Status hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status hearing on June 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

1:49 PM Defendant Lynn E Chapman appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of complaint.  Public defender's office is still seeking counsel for defendant.  Defendant states she filed a motion to modify bond.  Court is not yet in receipt of motion.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 10:15 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
9:37 AM Defendant Lynn E Chapman in court, in custody.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Public defenders is continuing to search for counsel for defendant. Defendant notes Attorney Gross represents her in other cases.  Victim rights legislation has been complied with. Defendant motions for a lower cash bond.  Court denies motion at this time.  Defendant may file a written motion with the court for bond modification.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
SPD Status of Counsel Report - 35 contacts

Defendant appears in court in custody without counsel. DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant received complaint. Defendant is public defender eligible and they are making attempts to locate counsel. Court adjourns initial appearance to April 25th at 9:45 am. bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 25, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Court sets $300.00 cash bond. Conditions, no contact with James Stenberg, No contact with Trigs. Court sets initial appearance to April 4th at 9:45 am.
